duration_in_months: It is expected for the contract to last for 1 year
full_summary:
**Standard First Aid and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation "Level C" and Automated External Defibrillator Training and Recertification**

## Solicitation Summary
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide Standard First Aid and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) Level C, and Automated External Defibrillator (AED) training and recertification services.

## Scope of Work
The contractor will provide qualified instructors to teach the most recent First Aid and CPR techniques approved by the Minister of Labour in accordance with Part XVI of the Canada Occupational Health and Safety Regulations. The training will be conducted at various locations in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

## Key Dates
* Expected contract start date: April 1, 2023
* Expected contract end date: March 31, 2024 (with optional extensions for up to two additional one-year periods)
* Tender closing date: March 7, 2023 14:00:00 EST

## Tender Requirements
The contractor must meet the following minimum qualifications:
* Be an organization with expertise in Standard First Aid and CPR Level C, and AED training and recertification services
* Have a proven track record of providing high-quality training services
* Be able to provide qualified instructors who meet the required standards

## Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the contractor will be based on the lowest-priced responsive bid.

## Important Documents
The following documents are available for download:
* [Request for Proposal (RFP) document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/10/6b43c705607ec0a68a5248a5b242a10b/202302449_-_request_for_proposal_-_eng.pdf)
* [Solicitation Amendment 001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/17e23ab05185bbf408c1c8075a7602cf/202302449_-_solicitation_amendment001_-_eng.pdf)
* [Solicitation Amendment 002](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/03/cc640429c13da1beb808f679fcdafd4e/202302449_-_solicitation_amendment002-en_fig-.pdf)
